_header: Said this untrue man himself for to shend
Subjects: usury; devil; debates, between angels and devils
_description: Dispute between demons and angels at the death-bed of a usurer — sixteen lines in couplets

CamCCC392.First Lines:
Sayde þys vntrewe man hym self for to schendeMy god schal y
                    noth dred now at my last ende…
CamCCC392.Last Lines:
…Euery man þat ys born yn to þys wordles woSchal
                    truste yn þy mercy wyngys for now & euer mo
CamCCC392.Editions:
Barnicle,  Mary Elizabeth. 
             “The ‘Exemplum’ of the Penitent Usurer.” 
             PMLA
         33 (1918): 409-28: 416-17.
